column1: The Pit Room////They have all the traditional meats
column4: and delicious smoked turkey. Their sides are all made in house. The beans were okay
column5: but the macaroni and cheese and the potato salad were amazing. Even their fixins are obviously chopped and mixed in house. The pickle slices are thick
column6: but watch out for the jalape√±os! They don't remove the seeds.
